Menu and Drinks
Modified on: Wed, 14 Sep 2022 8:36 AM
Question
No. Question & Answer
Q 1
Is Jain food available in BBQ nation? Response
Yes, surely assist with information, can I know no. of pax looking for Jain food, is that
you’re looking for lunch or dinner. According to the information given by guest, Yes we
have Jain food available but variety will be limited and once you reach to outlet you
should inform to outlet team on Jain food , shall I proceed for reservation
Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 2
Does Barbeque Nation serve Halal food? Response Sir/Mam, Yes we serve Halal food (Meat) in all the barbeque nation outlets. Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 3
Do you have any proof / Certificate for Halal? Response Mam/Sir, We do have certificate in all the barbeque nation outlets. Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 4
What is the menu for today? Response Surely Mam/Sir, I will assist with information:- Inform the menu as per altius / Menu details in KP
Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 5
Is outside Alcoholic drink allowed in Barbeque Nation outlet? Response Mam/Sir, I'm sorry to inform outside drinks are not allowed in Barbeque Nation. However we serve 
drinks in barbeque nation as per ala carte menu 
Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
5/12/25, 2:19 PM
Menu and Drinks : Barbeque Nation
https://barbequenation.freshservice.com/support/solutions/articles/27000024770-Menu-and-Drinks
1/4
Q 6
Can I get the drinks details through mail? Response
Yes mam/sir, (1.) I would request you to download barbeque nation app and click on 
menu, you can view the drinks menu (2.)Please provide your mail ID, we will send 
drinks details
Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 7
Does Barbeque nation have ala carte menu for food? Response Mam/Sir, for dine-in services we serve unlimited buffet. Ala carte menu is available only for takeaway and 
delivery services
Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 8
Can I get particular dish once I reach the outlet? Can I customize the menu? Response
Mam/Sir , if you want any change in menu like taste , spicy or less spicy changes can
be made. But if you want additional dish apart from menu need to check with branch as per
availability you will get. Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 9
Does Menu remain same for all the outlets? Response Yes,mam/sir menu is standard across all branches of barbeque nation
Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 10
What type of fish do Barbeque nation serve? Response Mam/Sir, We serve BASA fish which is boneless fish
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 11
What type of prawns do barbeque nation serve? Response Mam/Sir, we serve Medium size prawns which is called as Zinga prawns
Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 12
What are the types of Ice-cream do barbeque nation serve? Response Mam/Sir, We serve two flavor of ice cream that is Vanilla and strawberry. Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

Menu and Drinks : Barbeque Nation

2/4
Q 13
Flavor of Kulfis
Response
Mam/Sir, We serve six flavor of kulfis that is Strawberry , Malai , Chocolate , Kesar badam,
Paan , Mango
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 14
Is their any change in menu for lunch & dinner?

Response
Mam/Sir, The menu remains same for lunch & dinner
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 15
What type of briyani do you serve ? Will I get mutton briyani? Response
Mam/Sir, We serve chicken briyani. Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 16
Do you serve alcoholic drinks in barbeque nation? Response
Mam/Sir, Provide information as per altius update for alcoholic drinks (drinks are
served as per ala carte menu)
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 17
Can I have only drinks in barbeque nation? And can I pay only for drink? Response
Mam/Sir, Sorry to inform you sir/mam, Only drinks cannot be served. Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 18
Do you serve Kulcha, roti, naan roti? Response
Mam/Sir
 Yes , we do serve
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 19
Is Pizza available in menu ? Response
Mam/Sir, sorry to inform Pizza is not available in menu
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 20
Is Hukkah available in barbeque nation outlet ? Response
Mam/Sir, sorry to inform Hukkah  is not available in barbeque nation outlets. Your session is about to expire! You have been inactive for a long time. For security
reasons, you will be automatically logged out in 0
seconds. Click anywhere on the screen to stay logged in. 5/12/25, 2:19 PM

https://barbequenation.freshservice.com/support/solutions/articles/27000024770-Menu-and-Drinks
3/4
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 21
Do we serve jataka food in barbeque nation? Response
Sir/Mam, surely we will assist with infromation.we don’t serve jataka food in barbeque
nation
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 22
What type of mutton we serve for starters? Response
Sir/Mam, We serve mutton seekh kebab for starters 
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 23
Does barbeque nation serve goat  or sheep for mutton? Response
Sir/Mam, we serve goat for mutton in barbeque nation
Tagging
Enquiry - Menu & Drinks
Q 24
Do we have Crab in Menu? Response
Sir/Mam, We don't have crab currently only Fish , Prawn we have in Sea food. Tagging
